A4.text: A pop version of the 'Beauty and the Beast' theme, performed by Céline Dion and Peabo Bryson over the end credits, was released as a commercial single from the film's soundtrack

A5.text: Celine Dion performed the song 'How Does a Moment Last Forever' over the end titles of the 2017 film
